column4: hi all.  quick question - i use my ubuntu laptop (Xubuntu 11.04 ) to allow my 360 to access the wireless network in my house but i dont know how to allow it to access the windows media center extender on my desktop over the network. any ideas?
yeah that is what i am doing Polah
i deactivated my windows firewall but no dice
ask in a Windows IRC channel then. We're for Ubuntu help and I don't think the problem lies with that
